function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of efficient surveillance system for tracking infection and transmission trends among employees","Impact":"Increased risk of undetected spread of contagious diseases in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implement an efficient surveillance system and communicate trends to employees","Technologies":"Surveillance software, contact tracing apps","People":"Employees, workplace stakeholders","Owner":"Management, workplace health and safety team"},{"Description":"Inadequate availability of cleaning detergent and disinfectants at strategic places","Impact":"Risk of surfaces remaining contaminated and contributing to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure strategic availability of cleaning detergent and disinfectants at high-touch surfaces","Technologies":"Disinfectant dispensers, automated cleaning systems","People":"Employees, visitors","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning and maintenance team"},{"Description":"Deviation from International Health Regulations (IHR) by some countries","Impact":"Risk of inconsistent and ineffective response to international spread of diseases","Mitigation":"Adherence to IHR regulations and coordination among countries","Technologies":"International health databases, communication platforms","People":"Global health organizations, government agencies","Owner":"Global health organizations, international regulatory bodies"}]}
